SubscribeHdr.Title: Subscribe
SubscribeHdr.ShortHelp: Lets you subscribe to all available notifications for the selected objects.
UnSubscribeHdr.Title: Unsubscribe
UnSubscribeHdr.ShortHelp: Lets you unsubscribe from all notifications for the selected objects.
EditSubscribeHdr.Title: Edit Subscriptions
EditSubscribeHdr.ShortHelp: Lets you subscribe to or unsubscribe from specific notification events for the selected object.
EditSubscribeHdr.LongHelp: The dialog box lets you select or clear the check box for the events that apply to the object.
MySubscriptionsHdr.Title: My Subscriptions
MySubscriptionsHdr.ShortHelp: Lets you list all your subscription notifications.
MySubscriptionsHdr.LongHelp: The dialog box lets you filter the list based on the object type and event, and search for text (either object or event names). You can click for any event to unsubscribe yourself, or select any number of events and click on the toolbar to unsubscribe from all of the selected events.
PushSubscribeHdr.Title: Subscribe for Others
PushSubscribeHdr.ShortHelp: Lets add subscription for other persons for specific events.
PushSubscribeHdr.LongHelp: This dialog box lets you select users or user groups, and select the events to subscribe.
ViewSubscribeHdr.Title: Edit Subscriptions for Others
ViewSubscribeHdr.ShortHelp: List all objects for which you have added subscriptions for other persons
ViewSubscribeHdr.LongHelp: The dialog box lets you expand and view subscriptions by object, event type, and person. You can unsubscribe a person from an event.
